title: Schema for a 360Giving Data Grant Package

version.title: Version
version.description: The version of the 360Giving schema used in this package, expressed as major.minor For example: 1.1

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of the 360Giving data package. Should be a human readable version of information contained in the filename of the data and should be unique

description.title: Description
description.description: Full description of the information contained in the 360Giving data package.

issued.title: Issued
issued.description: The date that this data package was issued.

modified.title: Modified
modified.description: The date that this data package was last modified.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: A unique identifier for this data package. This should be unique for a particular publisher.

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: Information to uniquely identify the publisher of this package.

identifier.title: identifier
identifier.description: The organisation identifier as descriibed by [org-id.guide](http://org-id.guide/)

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the organisation or department responsible for publishing this data.

logo.title: Logo
logo.description: URL of the logo of the publishing organisation.

downloadURL.title: Download URL
downloadURL.description: URL of where to download this data package.

accessURL.title: Access URL
accessURL.description: URL of the website where the data this data package could be found.

license.title: License
license.description: A link to the license that applies to the data in this package. A Public Domain Dedication or [Open Definition Conformant](http://opendefinition.org/licenses/) license is strongly recommended. The canonical URI of the license should be used. Documents linked from this file may be under other license conditions.
